main event: A civilian woman in Fortville, Indiana observed an unknown object on February 24, 1953, that resembled a balloon and was trailing a high altitude vapor trail.
interesting points: The sighting was confirmed by USAF air defense personnel and the Indiana Army National Guard., The object was observed moving in a northeasterly direction for approximately five minutes., Clear weather conditions prevailed during the sighting., A pilot weather balloon was scheduled for release around the same time, potentially explaining the sighting., No photographs or physical evidence were obtained.
sighted object: unknown object resembling a balloon with a vapor trail
